name: HELP - The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program
name_original: HELP - The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program
description:
The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program (HELP) is now hiring for new talent! Are you a team player who works hard,  can handle challenging situations, and questions the status quo? This fulfilling position is located at the peaceful hamlet where you can enjoy homely, local cuisine or take a breather at the nearby forest path. 

As one of our HELPers, you will be assigning certified heroes to quests vetted by your manager. This position is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door for the lucrative, history-rich Hero industry. You will have opportunities to meet famous heroes and work closely with them as you recognize their needs and talents as they pertain to quests.

No experience? No problem! If you have finished all certified HELP examinations prior to applying, our expert management team will give you high class, AWARD WINNING training to get you settled in. 

So what are you waiting for? Apply today!

Qualifications:

- Two years of prior work experience in a customer facing or account role required.

- Basic computer knowledge and familiarity with spreadsheet and documentation software required.

- May be expected to carry up to twenty pounds of packaging and materials as they arrive for basic office functions.

- Must be trainable, and willing to learn!

- Work-From-Home is not available for this role.

- Bring your best smile!
